data.title: Movie Mentions
data.meta_description: Throughout the day WFUV deejays are mixing in songs from fi
data.text:
Throughout the day WFUV deejays are mixing in songs from film soundtracks. In addition to that, for the Question of the Day, you can request a song that references a particular movie. There are a lot of songs that mention actors, but how many can you name that reference certain movies? List them in the comments below and we'll roll the credits after 9am.

Here's what we played:

Queen "Bicycle Race" - Jaws, Star Wars

Harvey Danger "Carlotta Valdez" Vertigo

Tori Amos "Rattlesnakes" On the Waterfront

Eytan Mirsky "(I Just Wanna Be) Your Steve McQueen" The Great Escape, Bullitt, The Getaway, The Hunter, The Thomas Crown Affair, The Cincinnati Kid, The Towering Inferno
